duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide personalized Korean language tutoring to students.
Adapt teaching style to meet the needs of individual students.
Conduct online tutoring sessions using the Varsity Tutors platform.
Assist students in understanding Korean language and culture.
Support students in improving their communication and comprehension skills in Korean.
Prepare and deliver effective and engaging online lessons for students.
Assess student progress and provide feedback to enhance learning outcomes.

education_certification.credential: Proficiency in Korean language (Bachelor's degree in Korean language or related field preferred)
